MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL65 postcode area of Holyhead, affecting properties in Station Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:58AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of extensive repairs required. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:44PM on 1st March 2021.
